translation: Fo ri puzhao huiban chu shi chanshi yulu vol. 17 yinche peaks (yuyanche) ldh (tuhanche) matsa (upp. moloche, down. suheche) sheng (actually zhuanche) pen (ponjin) quanzhou (upp. kuchaoche, down. lihaoche) jiang (xuhuooche) steep (dangkouche) roots (kulaioche) lofty (drag cut) high mountains (lingzhioche) 鎌 (lijanche) sugan (jayaoche)
